website_summaries.verdict: A classic Burberry fragrance that offers a fresh scent with notes of musk, cedar, and vanilla.
pros: Ideal for those looking for a fresh scent that's not too floral or heavy, customers love that it is not overwhelming
Versatile enough for different occasions and subtle enough to wear to work
cons: The occasional customer felt that the scent didn't last, and some felt it was too pricey for its size

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 the price at Target
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent, but you can get the same size bottle at Target for $29.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C

customer_reviews.title: To small for the price !
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed on the size of the bottle for what I payed for it! Very small! I’ve been buying the same Burberry for 42.00 at Walmart now for 3 years and it’s the big bottle! Makes 2 of this one for the price I payed! Would have sent back if I hadn’t purchased it with a gift card I received for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and well appreciated fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love this fragrance! I am stopped on a regular basis by men and women alike asking for the name of my perfume! I have allergies to many fragrances, but this is one I can wear without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: N Spivey

customer_reviews.title: So small!!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle fits in the palm of your hand, I have ordered this from another on line company, for many years, guess I'll go back to them, this small bottle is very disappointing, Burberry is not that expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ann

customer_reviews.title: My Wife's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first bottle of this for my wife many years ago, after sampling many other fragrances. This and one other are, by a wide margin, her favorites. It is long lasting but never overpowering, floral but clean and crisp, never cloying or sticky sweet. It is a bit more expensive than some competitors, but still worth it's price. It gets replaced in our house as needed, it is consistently that good.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Bob

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent but it seems to take too much ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent but it seems to take too much and doesn’t last. I’m wondering if it’s authentic
customer_reviews.author: Lawlady

customer_reviews.title: BURBERRY for Women Eau de Parfum, 1. 0 ...
customer_reviews.text: BURBERRY for Women Eau de Parfum, 1.0 fl.oz ... Not the same fragrance as the others that I have ordered, the new bottle was much darker than the others and took too much to get a decent fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Classy, not overpowering but doesn’t just fade away, clean, pretty scent. The best of the collection
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Abanathie

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and this company but I can buy it so much cheaper somewhere else. I do lot like being charged so I will not buy from here again
customer_reviews.author: DB12

customer_reviews.title: GLAD I TREATED MYSELF
customer_reviews.text: I AM FINALLY ABLE TO WEAR A REAL PARFUM THAT I AM NOT BOTHERED BY THE SCENT ..THIS FRAGRANCE IS NOT FLOWERY, AND I LOVE IT! NOT TOO HEAVY NOT TOO SWEET... I CAN SAVOR THE SCENT WITHOUT BEING SUFFOCATED.. SMELLS LIKE A BEAUTIFUL SUNNY AUTUMN DAY!
customer_reviews.author: NEZ

customer_reviews.title: Caution to customers when ordering cosmetics or perfume
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this Burberry product. It does not smell little me the perfume I had from the department store. I was also disappointed in the amount for what I paid. Now I see it is not returnable, so it is my loss. I will think twice about ordering any product of this type. I have always been happy with most products, but very unhappy with this perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Subtle beautiful perfume good for your soul
customer_reviews.text: This has quickly become my favorite perfume. It is light and airy, yet has such a wonderful, soothing fragrance. Just a spritz is enough to lift your mood and help you face the day no matter what it holds.
customer_reviews.author: Maxilyn

customer_reviews.title: Soft and sweet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a magazine insert however found it to be a little too sweet
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Burberry Women's Classic Eau de parfum
customer_reviews.text: I was so upset when I got this on how small and how it had No Scent and found out they sold me a Knock off brand from Germany. And the Cost was way to much for that. I would not recommend this Burberry to Buy and When you Do Buy Burberry and Make Sure it is the Real Deal. Such a Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S. Fernald

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is not the scent I’m familiar with that’s Burberry. It has to be fake or something. It smells terrible and I’m very disappointed because I can’t send it back since it’s opened. I don’t recommend buying from here.
customer_reviews.author: Wynot_me

customer_reviews.title: nice smell
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift . this was a great gift
customer_reviews.author: orlie Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to perfume. Always receive compliments Not a strong scent. My husband describes it as professional - probably cause I wear it to work. Beautiful scent
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Eller

customer_reviews.title: This is not the original product
customer_reviews.text: This is not the original scent. Also if you receive this item since it is considered flammable they will not let you send it back. If you like the new scent then it's fine. If you are looking for the original do not purchase this item. It will just be a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful & light, the right fragrance for any occasion. Fragrance lasts from morning to night.

customer_reviews.title: THANKS FOR NOTHING !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I DID NOT LIKE THIS ITEM , VERY DISAPPOINTED , It was a Christmas present to my Mom. It is her favorite perfume. Scent what sent . It's got to a knock off. Thanks for Nothing. I got ripped off.

customer_reviews.title: I love the perfume however
customer_reviews.text: I love the perfume however, the size bottle and the price was quite disappointing. I bought a bottle of this perfume in a much larger size in January for the same price. The was what I wanted to re-order but couldn't. This small bottle was a big disappointment. Not happy at all.

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase. I do not believe this Burberry ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. I do not believe this Burberry London, I think it is a nock off. For this price you can get a regular size, not travel size.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my Mother and she really likes it.

customer_reviews.title: Love Burberry Perfume

customer_reviews.title: My favorite perfume, EVER!

customer_reviews.title: The sexiest smell on a woman .

customer_reviews.title: FAKE FAKE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This is not the authentic Burberry women’s classic perfume. This is a knock off. This knock off is also way overpriced. Do not waste your money

customer_reviews.title: Burberry original
customer_reviews.text: I love burberry original and Amazon has made it so easy for me to find. I have had trouble in the past finding it.

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled
customer_reviews.text: This does not even smell like the one in the store that I tested. I am very disappointed at the quality of this product. It smells like spoiled. I would like to return this and receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jmrinidaho

customer_reviews.title: It turns me on
customer_reviews.text: I have it to my girlfriend and she loved it, the scent lasts all day and it's very pleasant.

customer_reviews.title: Quality cologne
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our daughter. It is her favorite scent and the price was comparable to retail stores.

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: The scent seemed weak like it was old or watered down

customer_reviews.title: Burberry Pricing
customer_reviews.text: Price...On the Burberry Classic, @59 + shipping for a mere 1 oz. is a bit outrageous. Please compare to other Perfume specialties...

customer_reviews.title: Worth it

customer_reviews.title: Best perfume out there today!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Which means I'm grateful for it. ;)

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Genuine product. Last for days until you take a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny D

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd bottle of Burberry from this supplier and both bottles were "old" and didn't smell like it should. I'm not able to wear it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Bought this perfume for my lady for mothers day. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this perfume for my lady for mothers day. She loves it. And the aroma it gives off turns me on to her even more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this gift ! So do do I !
customer_reviews.author: TRUITT MCCLURE

customer_reviews.title: I Love this perfume but I'm wondering if the Company changed ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. I Love this perfume but I'm wondering if the Company changed it's scent..it doesn't smell like before this was my number 1 perfume. It has absolutely no staying power. Maybe I got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: NY Girl

customer_reviews.title: I love this scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Scent lasts a good while. Sweet, clean, soft scent. Boyfriend loves it. Doesn't irritate sensitive my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfume ! Just wish it wasn't so expensive! I will continue to order it !

customer_reviews.title: I love this perfume but the price is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume but the price is horrible. I just bought a 3.3 fl oz on Overstock for $40.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is perfect. It's fresh and clean. It's good for any events. I get complements on it everywhere I go. I am in love.
customer_reviews.author: Jordin Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Heady
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this perfume. Not sure if the price is right but my wife certainly thinks so. Would buy any perfume by Burberry.

customer_reviews.title: Scent is not the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. This is not the real Burberry parfum. The scent is nothing like the original. How do vendors get away with lying about the brand of a product? Will not buy parfum off of Amazon again. No way to verify it's authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Very Very small.... Not worth the money at all... Very disappointed in this product. A total rip off
customer_reviews.author: james evans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, light fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend almost $100, so I got this Burberry for less than $50 and it is LOVELY! I had not smelled it before I ordered it, so I was a little nervous. My husband says he smells a bit of vanilla. I think it could be vanilla, but it's just very light and not overbearing or too sweet or too spicy. Great buy and great smell! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Spindoc1991

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved the smell and it always remind me of her
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this perfume as a gift for my mother. I have always loved the smell and it always remind me of her!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite fragrance over the years for me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great smell it's soft and fresh and it's not overwhelming

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed at the size for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed at the size for the price. I have used this perfume for a long time and do not remember paying so much for such a small bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus P. Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Threw 1/4 of the bottle out. No perfume smell. Don't understand?
customer_reviews.author: PeaHen

product_meta.title: Burberry Women's Classic Eau de Parfum, 1.0 Fl oz
product_meta.description:
Burberry for Women Eau de Parfum is a fresh and sensual fragrance. The scent features fruity top notes of blackcurrant, fresh green apple and bright bergamot. Heart notes of cedar wood, jasmine, moss are intensified with warm notes of sandalwood for a rich and sensual tone. Warm notes of musk and vanilla smooth the base. Ingredients - water, alcohol denatured, limonene, linalool.

BRAND STORY
Founded in 1856, Burberry is led by principles of design, innovation and expert craftsmanship. Our signature fragrances are presented in crafted glass bottles, with scents inspired by music and fashion, London and British icons.
